entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who will be discussing the running of the school with Harry tomorrow.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as a place Dumbledore needs to return to.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the recipient of winnings from Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Dumbledore needs to return to the Ministry, indicating it is his destination.
Dumbledore gives Harry a large bag of gold as winnings.
